text: Liberation () is a 1970 Soviet war drama movie directed by Yuri Ozerov.10 военных фильмовОСВОБОЖДЕНИЕ (1968,1970,1971) It stars Nikolay Olyalin, Larisa Golubkina, and Vsevolod Sanaev. ==Actors== * Nikolay Olyalin as Tzvetaev. * Larisa Golubkina as Zoia. * Vsevolod Sanaev as Lukin. * Boris Seidenberg as Orlov. * Viktor Avdyushko as Maximov. * Yuri Nazarov as Russian Liberation Army soldier. == References == ==Other websites== * Category:Soviet movies Category:1970 movies Category:Soviet drama movies Category:Soviet war movies
title: Liberation (movie series)
